title: ［勒索］美國過唔到救巿方案 因為民主黨提大堆唔關事要求 eg 提高環保排放標準 修改選舉法 更新‘非入境人士’visa

replies.msg:
Nancy Pelosi Proposes 1,400-Page Coronavirus Bill Stuffed with Special Interest Goodies

The bill includes a wish list of Democrats’ pet issues including:

1. Increased fuel emission standards for airlines receiving funds and carbon offsets⋯⋯

3. Same-day voter registration, early voting, voting by mail, ballot harvesting

The bill includes several provisions on voting laws and regulations, as Democrats argue that the crisis should force the government to revisit voting regulations to make it easier to vote, allowing same-day voter registration and voting by mail, and mailing out ballots to absentee voters.

Other voting fraud watchdogs raised flags about ballot harvesting and grants for conducting risk-limiting audits of election resultsSame-day registration⋯⋯


4. Preserving collective bargaining powers for unions

5. The expansion of wind and solar tax credits.

6. Requirements for federal and corporate gender and racial diversity data

7. Automatic extension of nonimmigrant visas.

https://www.breitbart.com/politics/2020/03/23/nancy-pelosi-proposes-1120-page-coronavirus-bill-stuffed-with-pork/

Republicans had a deal until Nancy Pelosi rode into town from her extended vacation. The Democrats want the Virus to win? They are asking for things that have nothing to do with our great workers or companies. They want Open Borders & Green New Deal. Republicans shouldn’t agree!

by Trump 3 hrs Twitter

“民主黨都講很明白了質疑的點在哪

1. Mnuchin直接要500B又不肯細說用途。以為民主黨是北七這時候
會開張空白支票給川皇亂花？要拿錢就把詳細用途列出來啦

2. 給企業的錢用途要明文限制，不能只是「口頭勸導」他們不要發
股利或拿來分紅。這是上次金融海嘯的經驗，那次政府紓困銀行結
果銀行拿去大發分紅給高層”

係共和黨官商勾結先反對咋

依加出事又乘機亂fing錢

果銀行拿去大發分紅給高層”
